definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook

sentences.english: Are these sentences about the passage true or false?Put a tick or a cross.
sentences.chinese: 這些關於這故事的句子是對還是錯的？請打勾或打叉。

sentences.english: You should check each item off as she dictates the list.
sentences.chinese: 她念清單時你應當逐項覈對並打勾。

sentences.english: Check the box next to an effect to enable it.
sentences.chinese: 在某一特效旁邊的複選框上打勾以啓用它。

sentences.english: Would you like to subscribe to our mailing list. This will keep you updated with up coming events, and news.
sentences.chinese: 一定要打勾同意公司守則，然後點提交表格。

sentences.english: This is likely to take the form of a tick-box on the sign-up page.
sentences.chinese: 這很可能會在註冊頁面上採取打勾的形式。

sentences.english: Now listen again and put a tick in the'conversation'or'Text message'column.
sentences.chinese: 現在再聽一次，在‘對話’或‘發短信’裏打勾。

sentences.english: Select one box which best describes your current situation.
sentences.chinese: 請在下列一個最適合你目前情況的方框內打勾。

sentences.english: Listen and tick the word you hear.
sentences.chinese: 聽，然後把你聽到的單詞打勾。

sentences.english: Self-check: Tick the ball games you know.
sentences.chinese: 你都知道哪些球類運動呢？請打勾。

sentences.english: Check the box that says "Role management enabled" and apply the change.
sentences.chinese: 在”開啓角色管理器“複選框前打勾並應用這次改變。

sentences.english: Look read and tick or cross.
sentences.chinese: 看圖，讀句子，打勾或打叉。

sentences.english: Listen and tick in the table.
sentences.chinese: 聽一聽，並在表格裏打勾。

sentences.english: The teacher ticks off a name on a list.
sentences.chinese: 老師在名單上的一個名字旁打勾。

sentences.english: Check here if this is an amendment to an existing Roth IRA .
sentences.chinese: 如果對現有羅斯個人退休帳戶進行修改，請在此打勾。

definition: tick/check mark (✓)/number for verification (serial number, seat number etc)/(fig.) two things match up

pinyin: ping2 mu4 bao3 hu4 cheng2 xu4

definition: Save As ... (menu option in a software application)
